title: U.S. Open: A Closer Look At 15-Year-Old 'CiCi' Bellis
teaser: Catherine Bellis is the youngest player to win a match at the tennis tournament since Anna Kournikova in 1996.
contentencoded:
Businessweek is calling 15-year-old Catherine “CiCi” Bellis “Silicon Valley’s tennis start-up.” Bellis won her first match on Tuesday at the U.S. Open, making her the youngest player to win a match at the tournament since Anna Kournikova in 1996.

Jon Wertheim of Sports Illustrated joins Here & Now’s Robin Young to talk about Bellis and other developments at the U.S. Open.

Guest

  • Jon Wertheim, executive editor and a senior writer for Sports Illustrated. He tweets @jon_wertheim.
